00016 Cruijff_pdf_class::Cruijff_pdf_class(RooRealVar& invMass_, double mRes_, TString name, TString title):
00017 
00018   M("M_{Z}",   "",  invMass_.getVal(), invMass_.getMin(), invMass_.getMax(), "GeV/c^{2}"), // potrebbe avere un range piu' stretto
00019   sigma_L(  "\\sigma_{L}","Width left side",  2.14, 0.,  10.0, "GeV/c^{2}"),
00020   sigma_R(  "\\sigma_{R}","Width right side", 2.14, 0.,  10.0, "GeV/c^{2}"),
00021 
00022   alpha_L(  "\\alpha_{L}","tail left side",  0.2, 0.,  1., ""),
00023   alpha_R(  "\\alpha_{R}","tail right side", 0.2, 0.,  1., ""),
00024 
00025   //--------------- pdf totale signal
00026   // convoluzione della Breit-Wigner e della risoluzione sperimentale
00027   cruijff_pdf(name, title, invMass_, M, sigma_L, sigma_R, alpha_L, alpha_R),
00028   mRes(mRes_),
00029   pdf(cruijff_pdf),
00030   params(M, sigma_L, sigma_R, alpha_L, alpha_R)
00031 
00032 {
00033 
00034   return;
00035 }

00042 std::pair<double,double> Cruijff_pdf_class::GetDeltaM(void){
00043 #ifdef DEBUG
00044   M.Print();
00045 #endif
00046   return std::pair<double,double>(M.getVal()-mRes, M.getError());
00047 }
00048 
00049 std::pair<double,double> Cruijff_pdf_class::GetWidth(void){
00050 #ifdef DEBUG
00051   sigma_L.Print();
00052   sigma_R.Print();
00053 #endif
00054   return std::pair<double,double>(0.5*(sigma_L.getVal()+sigma_R.getVal()), 
00055                                   0.5* sqrt(
00056                                             sigma_L.getError() * sigma_L.getError() + 
00057                                             sigma_R.getError() * sigma_R.getError()
00058                                             )
00059                                   );
00060 }
00061 
00062 std::pair<double,double> Cruijff_pdf_class::GetDeltaM(RooFitResult *fitres){
00063   RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) fitres->floatParsFinal().find(M.GetName());
00064   if(var == NULL) var=&M;
00065   return std::pair<double,double>(var->getVal()-mRes, var->getError());
00066 }
00067 
00068 std::pair<double,double> Cruijff_pdf_class::GetWidth(RooFitResult *fitres){
00069   RooRealVar *var_L = (RooRealVar *) fitres->floatParsFinal().find(sigma_L.GetName());
00070   if(var_L == NULL) var_L=&sigma_L;
00071   RooRealVar *var_R = (RooRealVar *) fitres->floatParsFinal().find(sigma_R.GetName());
00072   if(var_R == NULL) var_R=&sigma_R;
00073 
00074   return std::pair<double,double>(0.5*(var_L->getVal()+var_R->getVal()), 
00075                                   0.5* sqrt(
00076                                             var_L->getError() * var_L->getError() + 
00077                                             var_R->getError() * var_R->getError()
00078                                             )
00079                                   );
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 void Cruijff_pdf_class::SetFitType(int _fit_type){
00084   switch(_fit_type){
00085   case 0: // all floating
00086     std::cout << "[INFO] All parameters floating" << std::endl;
00087     alpha_L.setConstant(kFALSE);
00088     alpha_R.setConstant(kFALSE);
00089     break;
00090   case 1: // fixed tail
00091     alpha_L.setConstant();
00092     alpha_R.setConstant();
00093     break;
00094   default:
00095     alpha_L.setConstant();
00096     alpha_R.setConstant();
00097     break;
00098   }
00099   return;
00100 }
00101 
00102 void Cruijff_pdf_class::InitFitValues(void){
00103   M.setVal(91.188);
00104   sigma_L.setVal(1);
00105   sigma_R.setVal(1);
00106   alpha_L.setVal(0.2);
00107   alpha_R.setVal(0.2);
00108   return;
00109 }
